text:
7 P 
Pres. Trump addresses Russia, the leaks and the "dishonest" media ... Martha has the latest out of D.C. on The First 100 Days . 8 P 
Americans are watching less television. Ratings are down for late night and morning programming. Bill investigates on a must-see O'Reilly Factor . 9 P 
Continued White House fallout: Who is behind the leaked information and how will President Trump deal with the latest developments? Charles Krauthammer has expert insight on Tucker Carlson Tonight . 10 P 
After his meeting with President Trump, Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu sits down for a special interview with Sean on a can't-miss Hannity . The First 100 Days Shapiro: Media 'Sound Like Used Car Salesmen' About Flynn Resignation Feb 15, 2017 7:59pm Daily Wire editor Ben Shapiro said media outlets expressing outrage over former National Security Adviser Michael Flynn's contact with a Russian envoy is akin to "a used car salesman trying to hawk Rep. King: Leak That Led to Flynn's Resignation Is a 'Criminal Action' Feb 14, 2017 9:29pm Rep. Peter King (R-NY) said on "The First 100 Days" tonight that authorities should investigate who leaked a wiretapped conversation between former National Security Adviser Michael Flynn and Russian... Gowdy: Trump's Immigration Order Can Be 'Easily Remedied' Feb 14, 2017 7:48pm Rep. Trey Gowdy (R-S.C.) believes issues with President Donald Trump's executive order barring immigration from seven Muslim-majority countries can be "easily remedied."
